name: Get Out Of My House (DoomZi)
description:
A student physics casual game made in 3 weeks.

The aftermath of your party isn’t going so well : your hungover guests are refusing to go home, leaving you with no choice but to punch and throw objects at them to knock them out and drag their unconscious body outside by yourself…

Credits : 

LAMOUCHE EMMA (Game Designer)

LEGORRE Joseph (Game Designer)

MOTA Kévin (Game Designer)

ALLEN Fanny (Game Designer)
